primary.brain_one: It could be called a repository or even a directory of tools and thoughts. We want it to become more, an online space where we share our mindset and open ourselves to everyone who wants to hear and get in touch. On our Angry Brain, you’ll find some of the stuff we
primary.brain_two: have been cooking, like documents, suggestions, drip-marketing sequences and a bit of this and that. Do you know that Dropbox folder where you save all the materials you use regularly? Ours is called Angry Brain and we wanted to share it with you. Be welcome!

fields.case_content: Are you a journalist? Do you want to know more about Angry Ventures' founding and overall history? Click to download our Press Release and find other useful materials. We will be happy to share. :)

Innovation, design, marketing, and business development. In every one of these areas, we use several tools, boards, and other stuff. We believe they are really helpful and that is why we wanted to share it. Feel free to use and suggest other ones.

It is much harder to work when you don’t have a structure. Who didn’t draw an app or a website on the paper wishing he had something more than a white page? We felt we needed our own mockups and templates, and that’s why we adapted some. Feel free to use them also!

primary.tools_content: There are several tools we use on a regular basis. They are simple, but they are still very important. Instead of keeping them for ourselves, we want to share them with you. They are all free and unlimited, so use them as you want.

fields.case_content: As you probably noticed, we recently evolved our brand into something different. Downloading our Brand Identity Guidelines and our Brand Strategy Book you will unveil some of the methods we used to find ourselves and show it to the world.

Do you know the Facebook’s Little Red Book? The one with small sentences, that reflects the company's values? We wanted to create our own. Something that could remember ourselves of who we are and reflect our constantly evolving mindset. Disclaimer: it is probably already outdated.

Our portfolio is the clearest reflection of our heart and brains. Here you can find some of the projects we developed, as well as some of the results we had. If you are curious enough to ask, we would really like to get in touch and send it personally.

primary.sequences_content: There are three kinds of things on the Internet: the original ones, the ones we would like to have created ourselves and the ones that inspired us. Drip marketing sequences are of the third kind: a simple thing that hopefully can help someone. Our secondary goal: prove that it only takes 5 minutes to learn something new.

primary.contact_footer: Don’t worry, we are good guys and we also hate spammers. We won’t pass your information and you can unsubscribe any time ; )
primary.contact_subtitle: We’ll be really happy to share the things we have been doing and reading
